website_summaries.verdict: Great price per ounce for an all-natural dog treat, delivering fiber for the pet.
pros: Individual pieces of these treats have a thick design that the dog will love to spend time chewing
Contains a large number of antioxidants and vitamins from natural sweet potatoes
Delivers a large amount of fiber to enhance the dog's health
cons: Some dogs won't like the taste
Texture may be too tough for older dogs

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat that Oliver loves!
customer_reviews.text: These are made in the USA and vegetarian. LOVE that! Oliver is a rescued dachshund (mix?) that is VERY fussy about his treats .He won't take just anything and he won't take it from just anyone. He took to these right away though. It lasts more than the average treat, something to really fulfill that desire to chew without packing on calories (or toxins)...a healthy snack for the furbaby is always a treat! Video clip is a bit of the chewing action....
customer_reviews.author: recycle-it

customer_reviews.title: Burned - not Dehydrated
customer_reviews.text: The package I received had planks not dehydrated, but burned so much that the whole package smells charred. At $18.00/pkg, I expect 100% good quality. I do not want to feed this to my dogs. I have a terminally ill dog and sweet potatoes are one of the things that he can eat. I am requesting to return and replace for good product. BTW - the image of package shows 1 lb and the description shows as 14 oz. I received 14 oz.
customer_reviews.author: robred99

customer_reviews.title: Big and crunchy
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving sweet potato treats to my dog (65 pound mutt) for years. When I needed to have a larger purchase on amazon to get some add-ons, I remembered I was low and these popped up, so I decided to try them. Dog loved them. They are harder, more crunchy than chewy, then others he has had. Similar texture to a pig ear. Also nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Woo

customer_reviews.title: Quality company, quality products
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active 18lb dog who needs his treats and he absolutely loves the Brutus sweet potato pieces. These are thick and don't dry up like others I've purchased, although I do cut them into smaller pieces. He also loves the Brutus chicken jerky. I will only feed him the best (because he earns it) and these are without a doubt the best I have bought so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bollocks

customer_reviews.title: HARD, DRY & BURNT
customer_reviews.text: Will wait until the Canine Caviar brand of sliced sweet potatoes is available. The B & B brand is inferior. The entire bag was nothing but hard, dry, burnt (literally) sliced sweet potatoe. As other reviewers stated, the slices are so burnt the charred odor hit me as soon as I opened the bag. We have 3 very small dogs so was necessary to cut the large VERY tough slices - that took some time & much determination even using my heaviest kitchen scissors. $18 (!!!) to discover that my dogs wont touch blackened food. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Good for chewing, not for digestion
customer_reviews.text: They gave our dogs severe diahrea much like humans would get from eating too many sweet potatoes., While they loved the flavor, it was bad for their digestion. In checking with our vet he told us to STOP giving them right away & use only rawhide chew type chew brands , never vegan or otgher types, lesson sell learned for our dogs health & Amazon carrues good rawhide brands we'll purchase from now on.
customer_reviews.author: OKdokie

customer_reviews.title: Cresties
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sweet potato treats because my two are having trouble with their original treats, Old Mother Hubbard biscuits. Everyone talked about how much their dogs loved sweet potatoes.... Well my two do not like sweet potatoes. I cut up one and gave them smaller pieces so they thought it was special and limited. The male refused to eat them and the female would just carry her piece around. I am hoping they will come to enjoy them. I may have to rub cheese one them!! I believe it is a personal choice of the dogs not liking them not that the treats are not good. They have never been vegetable eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Annabella loves these sweet potatoes
customer_reviews.text: My lab mix loves sweet potatoes. She is always so excited when we get something from Brutus & Barnaby. I haven't purchased anything from them that she didn't like. Our miniature pinscher loves them too. She was so excited when they arrived Saturday and she begs for more and often. No problems with digesting or other issues. I order 2 bags and I am so glad I did. She is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to the back teeth
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small dogs weighing 10 lbs and 17 lbs. They love these sweet potato slices but unfortunately it sticks to their back teeth causing them to choke and go into a panic if the piece is long enough to go part way down the throat. I ended up throwing the whole big bag away.
customer_reviews.author: Ladycaer

customer_reviews.title: Pups love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have a nearly 12yr old (extremely spry) & a 6mo old. Both enjoy these immensely! Might be giving the little one a bit of the runs (resolves same day), but that could be due to the fact that these are new to her & she's young so we shall see. My older boy dog has had no issues but has always adapted well to changes to his diet. My boy savors them for about 30 seconds. Puppy takes even less time. She's a machine...you should see what she's done to my couch lol. So, not long lasting for either, but still a nice treat that they love.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to watch your dog with these.
customer_reviews.text: These seemed amazing, but my dog got one lodged in the roof of his mouth. I was about to leave him happily chewing his treat, when I turned around he was doing contortions to breathe and get it dislodged! They are soft and chewy, so it had gotten caught on his teeth and it covered his airway. It was very frightening! I am grateful that I turned back. I had to work at finding and dislodging it from his mouth. I would have lost my dog. Please watch your dog with these. I cut them in small pieces and give them to him as small rewards now. He does love them... I won’t buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely LOVES these treats! Her old girl (14) eyes light up when she "sniffs" it and then she wkisks iy out right out of my hand! These are a bit pricey for me so I went out and bought a food dehydrator thinking I could make the same thing myself cheaper at home! WRONG! I couldn't even come close not to mention all of the electricity I was using!! My sweet girl and I HIGHLY RECOMMEND these treats. Great quality and great customer service <3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She liked it after figuring out it was food!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to try these for awhile, but was worried my picky pooch wouldn't eat them. When I gave her the first one, I think she thought it was a toy. She wanted to play with it until I tried to take it back. Then she figured out it was food and gobbled it up. Immediately begged for more. It's a healthy treat that will also be good for her fiber intake so I'm looking forward to results from that. I will update when she's had them for awhile on that. Its also a good amount for the price compared to most of her other treats.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: High quality chewy treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been suffering from VERY BAD allergy for several years and sweet potato is the only available treat per my dog's dermatologist. I usually purchase 2~3 different kinds of Sweet potato brands and this is the best one so far. Very good size for my dog to chew long enough. Some of brand offers hard rock solid potato whereas this brand offers nice chewable texture (maintains some moisture). You can smell fresh sweetness and I could not resist tasting it myself - And it is yummy!! Highly recommend for an especially mid to large size dog.
customer_reviews.author: Spatula

customer_reviews.title: Give it awhile
customer_reviews.text: When I first gave these to my 4 little dogs they carried them around and smelled them a lot. After a few hours and especially the next day, they were happily chewing on them and eating the little pieces. They don't smell bad like some of the other treats. I think these are actually better for them then the pig ears I used to buy. They are thick, generous slices. They are pricey but also made in America and safer then pig ears. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shari b.

customer_reviews.title: My Princes loves this brand sweet potatoes
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the Brutus & Barnaby Sweet Potato Dog Treats. She also loves sweet potatoes out of the can and left over sweet potato casserole. But I have given her other brands of sweet potato dog treats and she passes them by. I will say that Princess is a picky eater. We've had a number of other Australian Shepherds over the years, and this is the first picky eater I have ever owned. She also loves the Brutus & Barnaby Sweet Potato Dog Treats "Fries." When her sweet potato treats arrived in the mail yesterday, she sniffed out these immediately and followed me around until I opened them and gave her one.
customer_reviews.author: Gardner, I

customer_reviews.title: expensive and not particularly appealing
customer_reviews.text: these were expensive, and neither of my two german shepherds found them particularly tasty. they are not picky dogs, but they would take a piece of one of these (i had cut them into smaller pieces), carry it to the middle of the room, put it down and then look at me like "seriously? this is my treat?" they ate them each time. but for the cost, i would have wanted to see more enthusiasm. i will stick to meat based treats from now on.
customer_reviews.author: mvd

customer_reviews.title: Dog's LOVE 💘 this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my potatoes today, and I have to say, they are like doggy crack to my guys and gals!!! I was looking for an alternative to high-calorie treats for them, especially for the one that needs to lose weight. But I didn't think they would actually eat sweet potatoes! Lo and behold, they became sweet potato chow hounds, even the two girls that don't like anything! I also like that the potatoes can be torn or cut apart for smaller dogs like my Jack Russells. Buy these, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sneakypie

customer_reviews.title: My Westie can't get enough of these!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these (very quickly!) for the first time and was anxious to see how my westie would like them. He can't have treats that contain a lot of protein "cause he gets serious bladder stones. Unfortunately that eliminates about 99% of dog treats, so I'm always on the look out for things he can eat. Well, we have a definite winner with these!!! The pieces are very big, so I break off a smaller piece for him.to eat. His eyes get really big when he sees this, and he heads for his special spot under the table to eat it. This will certainly be a re-order!
customer_reviews.author: westie lover

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs devoured these healthy treats and begged for more!
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t last long in our house - in a good way! Our dogs loved them and were begging for more. The pieces are large, so they are great for big dogs, but even great for our smaller dogs because they devoured them quickly. I could tell they really liked them and I felt good about giving them as much of these healthy treats as they would like! They really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60 lb lab mix who loves to chew and chew on treats like these. And he won't touch these. I don't know if it's the taste or texture, but considering he eats poop and dirt, that can't say much for these. I gave them away to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: kld311

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for slow chewers
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews that said they were too soft for their dogs, but that’s exactly what I need. My dog is 12 and doesn’t have many teeth left but he loves to chew. So he is able to kind of “gum” these till they are soft enough to eat. They are about 1/4 inch thick and each slice is a decent size for my medium doggo.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: My 2 Coton De Tulear pups seemed to like these but I wasn’t a fan for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Coton De Tulear pups seemed to like these but I wasn’t a fan for a few reasons. 1. They stained the pups white fur around mouth and front paws. 2. For as large as they pieces they didn’t seem to last long. Others I have bought took much longer for the pups to finish them. Overall they were ok but the staining will keep me from buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sodapop

customer_reviews.title: What a treat!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Sweet potato and nothing else. They are grown in the US (instead of China) and simply dehydrated. The family follows up quite well after the sale...Good customer service from Trevor. It may or may not take your dog a few days to get used to the texture (soft and chewy) and perhaps the taste if they haven't eaten sweet potatoes before. It is a great product and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these sweet treats
customer_reviews.text: These sweet potato treats are fabulous. They are big soft slabs like a fruit leather. Pliability is excellent for cutting into smaller treats with scissors. Sweet potatoes are excellent snacks for my 8 year old pup (yellow Lab). They maintain her weight and she is crazy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Latteman

customer_reviews.title: Happy, Healthy Yorkies
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to find these. One of my Yorkies has terrible allergies, and one of the very few things I can give her is sweet potatoes. Both of my Yorkies LOVE these. They go crazy for them. I am so happy to have found these for my girls. Previously, I was buying them from an organic dog food store over an hour away from home. Now, I can just order Brutus Barnaby's and they're at my door in a day or 2. Thank you! You've made me and my girls very happy!
customer_reviews.author: fartblossom66

customer_reviews.title: My dog’s fav treat -  and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: My Ridgeback’s favorite treat! Absolutely lives them. I’m actually tempted to take a bite whenever I see them. They look like a slice of a delicious Longhorn sweet potato, but dried. I bet they’re human quality- sure look it. Great healthy snack for my dog and she enjoys gnawing bites off while I hold it. Just ordered 3 more bags. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: A A-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great for portion control, senior dogs & dog moms!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! It's hard to find healthy treats that both my senior & 5 year old boys can have that allows them both to chew on for a bit and these are perfect! I use kitchen scissors to cut them which allows me to give the tougher parts to the 5 year old and the softer, smaller piece to the senior dog while giving them each the same treat. Definitely have seen a drop in sibling rivalry in the treat department & I will definitely continue to purchase these. Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Life Coach

customer_reviews.title: Messy with hard edges
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs loves these, the other not so much. They are a bit messy; their paws and furs get sticky and they also stick to their teeth and the dogs have a hard time dislodging it. I brush their teeth after because having a sugar substance stuck to their teeth is just asking for dental problems. It does keep my one dog busy for a half hour. The edges and peels are a bit hard and I worry about them cutting my senior dogs gums. I don't think I'll buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: McKyla

customer_reviews.title: The pieces are pliable and smell good. My Schnauzers really like them
customer_reviews.text: This product is really fresh. The pieces are pliable and smell good. My Schnauzers really like them. I have been buying these treats from another company which stated MADE IN THE USA, but they quit selling on Amazon. These treats are as good as or better than the other company's. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants a safe and healthy treat for their dogs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Soft Enough For Small Dogs - Perfect Texture
customer_reviews.text: These Brutus & Barnaby sweet potatoes ARE THE ONLY dried sweet potatoes that are soft enough for our small dogs to chew - they are NOT dried too hard like many of the others and have PERFECT texture. They love the strong sweet smell and these are the only treats they get. Our Maltese and Maltese-Shih Tzu go crazy for them.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyMac

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have Great Pyrenees and it seems that all of the dehydrated sweet potatoes on the market were cutting their sweet potatoes into pieces and filling the bags for weight. I can’t do small pieces, I need large slices. I read the reviews and took a chance....these were great! Actual slices, not pieces! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Finally, my Frenchie can digest a chewy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 month old Frenchton, (1/2 French Bulldog, 1/2 Boston Terrier) both have digestive problems I have been looking for something he could chew on that he could digest without regurgitation. FINALLY, took a chance & ordered these. He loves them. They are chewy & big enough he can't swallow whole as we have nicknamed him hoover. I would suggest giving to them after meals, for my baby they are very filling. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these products and I don't feel bad giving them to her. I can't vouch for the flavor, since I haven't personally tried them but my normally calm dog will almost take your fingers off in her rush to grab one. We need to work on her manners but I can't really blame her. They look good enough to eat to me too. The service is fantastic and I would recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our picky bear loved them!
customer_reviews.text: After adopting our Pyrenees/Anatolian, I was looking for another option besides rawhide for treats and chews. She loved these sweet potato slices, even though I've since learned she tends to turn up her nose to vegetables and non-meat items consistently. Also, the company is great with follow up to purchases and customer service. I'd highly recommend working these into the mix of snacks you provide your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: ordered and really liked the size and the fact that they are not ...
customer_reviews.text: Found these, ordered and really liked the size and the fact that they are not so hard. BUT, opened the bag and within a week most are moldy and had to toss! There were 2 of the dry packs in the bag but they still molded. Disappointed. I was going to order more, but will not.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: A great treat!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these sweet potato treats! And I love that they are one ingredient, without a whole lot of preservatives and junk. We both love that they are nice big slices, usually 3-5 inches long and 2-3 inches wide. The only reason I took away one star is that my first bag got dry towards the bottom, although my next two did not have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: More potato than skin :-) !
customer_reviews.text: For several years I had been buying sweet potato treats from Pet Shoppe (Walgreen brand). They were quite popular, well-priced, all sweet potato, and my dogs loved them. Then, Pet Shoppe stopped making them. Since that time, I have searched for a good replacement. It seems like Brutus & Barnaby might just fill the bill! I see mostly sweet potato in the product and, of course, my dogs love them. Since they're two 55 lb dogs, there is little that doesn't disappear pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: Last bag I received was scrappy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this and this is my third bag. First two bags were very good. Third bag arrived and it was like they scrapped the bottom of the barrel to fill this bag. It looked like small scrap pieces that was disappointing since the cost 35.00
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet potato
customer_reviews.text: Edited Review: I’m editing my review of this product. The last package I ordered were well beyond dehydrated. In fact there were burn marks on them and they just snapped into tiny pieces. The first batch were dehydrated but pliable and I could cut them into treat sizes for my dogs. First review: My dogs love these! They are big slices cut long ways of sweet potatoes. I use a scissors to cut them in half.
customer_reviews.author: Mvb

customer_reviews.title: Real food for your fur baby
customer_reviews.text: Smells like sweet potatoes as soon as you open the bag. When you have a dog who likes sweet potatoes this will cause them to dance around you until you get to their snack spot. We are training a Labradoodle puppy to have her snacks on her bed ( way easier cleanup). This allows us to watch a movie while the 14 week old puppy enjoys her potato chews. This is so good for them and helps their digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: R VA

customer_reviews.title: Unconditionally Approved by the Expert
customer_reviews.text: I bring home Ella from a walk and she heads straight for the cabinet where these are stored. She loves them! I have one problem with them in that they are too large for her. I use heavy duty garden shears to cut them into halves and thirds. She would eat the entire thing - but that would be too much for a 45 lb dog. A great treat!
customer_reviews.author: Richard F Wicker III

customer_reviews.title: Four paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Both my pug pups love this healthy chewy treat! I've tried making them before and they've never come out like these ones do and it's extremely time consuming. They love their sweet potato chews and I love the convenience. Super happy customers here!
customer_reviews.author: cdu

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick for my dogs...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to like these treats but more importantly my poor older dog has digestive issues and these seem to alleviate those issues. One sweet potato treat per day is enough to keep her from experiencing her digestive issues that I used to have to treat with vet issued OTC medication.
customer_reviews.author: PNWAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Bag unsealed
customer_reviews.text: Have had no problem till now. My dog likes them. Pricey but good quality. However, the 14 oz. bag arrived today and had already been cut open at top. I’m leaving 2 star rating because customer service number is not good. Called twice, did not identify with company name, and after a minute went to voicemail. I double checked phone number. With these prices, that could be improved and an unsealed bag of dog snacks should not be shipped. Otherwise, good product, timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Tibbling

customer_reviews.title: More a gulp than a chew.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried three other sweet potato treats and this one comes in last due to quality of product in that the pieces are variable in size most being very small. They are more of a gulp than a chew. Most of the package was not big enough to chew. This company also charges a premium price for a less than premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Old Farmer

customer_reviews.title: great treats
customer_reviews.text: my dog is diabetic and we must be very careful with treats. I have been told sweet potato treats are ok in moderations. My dog seemed to like them and they are soft and chewy which makes them last longer. I will give them to him but will mix with treats I know are approved by vet for diabetes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves this but seems to give her a diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a high quality dried sweet potato, (it smells so good even I want to chew on this!) but unfortunately it seems to give a diarrhea to my 5 months old puppy. Also, the entire thing is consumed in about 10 minutes, so for the price, I prefer to purchase tendons which seems to be better value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ajaxtelamona

customer_reviews.title: Big Thick Chews
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as advertised. Unfortunately won’t work for our elder dog, who doesn’t have enough teeth to chew the treat, but the packaging is quality and the pieces are thick. They’re not soft at all though (nor is any dehydrated food item), so just make sure your dogs teeth can handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Iaquinta

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE this treat
customer_reviews.text: My older dog is a bone lover but can't have them anymore since she broke 2 of her teeth. I don't trust pig's ears or raw hides, so these treats are an amazing solution to give the dogs their chewing time. They LOVE them too. Thanks for this wholesome and healthy alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harris

customer_reviews.title: Luke loves his sweet potatoes
customer_reviews.text: Lukes loves the flavor and i dare anybody to try and take it from him while he's enjoying his after walk treat. He's a extremely well trained and very loving dog and will listen to all commands given to him and he's also a large 160 pound Rottweiler and a power house that just loves sweet potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Duardo

customer_reviews.title: Consistent from pack to pack and my dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have given my 2 black labs and 1 yellow lab sweet potatoes for treats each night for several years. I have now tried 4 two lb. packs of the Brutus and Barnaby potatoes and they are the highest quality sweet potato that I have used. I use only sweet potatoes processed in North America and have tried several brands from retailers and specialty stores and vets online. The Brutus and Barnaby sweet potatoes are consistent from pack to pack, which I can't claim for some of the others. Though the price is slightly higher, I will continue to buy these sweet potatoes for the quality. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star Jacket

customer_reviews.title: My dog wouldn't eat them
customer_reviews.text: Received them in a timely manner, however, my Schichon just won't eat them. My dog always loved Drs. Foster & Grant sweet potato fries. Unfortunately once Petco bought them out they are no longer available. I've tried various other sweet potato treats, most of which he eats, however, he does not like these at all. They are not as dry as similar products so you can cut them in half if they are too large for your dog. But since he won't eat them, they just lay on the floor for days until I throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cutroni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these things. I’ve reordered this product multiple times already. Shipping is always quick and most of the pieces are a decent size. They’re dehydrated enough that I don’t worry about them going bad but there is also enough moister left that I don’t worry about my dogs choking because of dry treats. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dog treat that would last my yellow lab longer than two seconds to eat, one that he liked and one that was good or at least not harmful for him. I found it in this product. A little pricey but in the long run worth it.
customer_reviews.author: WINTERWOODS

customer_reviews.title: Community Dogs Love These Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Community Representative in a Master Planned community and have a lot of dogs come through my office. Many of the dogs have allergies so I provide these treats as allergy-free alternatives and these dogs absolutely love these treats! They are all natural. Ingredients are simply sweet potatoes. That's it! They are dried and packaged in the U.S.A!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja L Rowland

customer_reviews.title: not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: These chews smell good, but are so tough my dog won't eat them unless I cut them up in little pieces, which is not easy because they are so tough. I'm going to try putting a brown sugar keeper disc in the container with the sweet potato to see if softening them up a little will help. He seems to like the flavor once they are made small enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. Macaluso

customer_reviews.title: FURTASTICLOUS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not real sure about longevity. Hope ita good. I did place them in the fridge tho. Flavor,,,, EXCELLENT!!! Value,,, Awesome!. I'm sure they will last a long time in rhe fridge too. My fur baby loves them. Thats makes me happy. They smell so good too. I want to eat one. One happy customer an one happy fur baby!!❤👍👍⚘💙🐕
customer_reviews.author: carolyn justis

customer_reviews.title: Good product. My Pittie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. Better than the ones I ordered from another popular one. It’s a little expensive but worth it. The sweet potatoes were larger & thicker slices. Very few little cuts. Will order again. Just wish it’s a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Sweet potato treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these treats. I have purchased other sweet potato treats in the past, & he has never been interested. These are the real deal, just like real sweet potato slices, crispy & crunchy! Definitely will purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product for dogs who are allergic to meat treats.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 large dogs who loved the Brutus & Barnaby Duck and Sweet Potato treats as an alternative. I received it last week and they loved the sweet potato slices which offered them a great treat with nice chew time. Since it arrived my daughter's puggle was told by her vet to keep him off of any meat treats for problematic allergies. This would be the perfect treat for any dog with meat allergies. I will be giving this pack to my daughter but will be back for another. Great quality treats, excellent customer service fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kat1271

customer_reviews.title: Best version of this I've found!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands and gotten a bag full of tiny, hard-as-a-rock pieces. Brutus & Barnaby consistently has delivered bags filled with big, meaty slices and only a few smaller bits. My dog loves them and with no additives, they're a healthy, guilt free treat.
customer_reviews.author: PMunroe

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them. 100 percent natural
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats because they are not hard. They are flexible dried slices of large sweet potatoes. They are big enough to cut in half with utility shears So you can get twice the number of treats since they’re not exactly inexpensive...
customer_reviews.author: PorkBun99

customer_reviews.title: Voracious Chewers Love These!
customer_reviews.text: My Mini Doxies are really hard chewers and most treats don't last long. These sweet potatoes must taste good because the pups really seem to love them and I like that they are more safe than other chews such as rawhide. They don't stop chewing until they are all gone!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Clough

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething puppies
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our teething puppy. We placed them in the refrigerator for a cool treat. He loved them. He is now almost through the teething phase and both of our dogs enjoy these sweet potato treats. We have a pit bull and German Shepard puppy
customer_reviews.author: M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes after giving my dog these treats for the ...
customer_reviews.text: 15 minutes after giving my dog these treats for the first time he had explosive diarrhea. This went on for about an hour. There was nothing different in my dogs diet so I have to suspect it was this product.
customer_reviews.author: Durvish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old lab loves these sweet potatoes! He bears down on them for sure. One slice seems to last around 15 minutes for him but he is a speed eater lol. I would highly recommend this natural product and will definitely be ordering more when this bag is empty.
customer_reviews.author: BBN4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates them
customer_reviews.text: My dog is on low fat diet and all he gets to eat is prescription dog food. I thought these would be a nice treat, but after 3 weeks of attempting to give them to him, they went in the trash. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Suire

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable taste
customer_reviews.text: My papillon sisters appear to love Brutus & Barnaby sweet potato treats. Since my pups are small theses treats are easy to break into smaller more manageable pieces. I would recommend this dog treat to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Nasr

customer_reviews.title: Just the right crunchiness
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Brutus & Barnaby sweet potato treats. They are done just right, not too dry (crunchy) and not too chewy (rubbery). When the sweet potato slices are overdone, they crumble. The dry pieces get eaten too fast but the chewy pieces take time. I know that the speed of inhaling is not an indication of how tasty a treat is but I like to see my dog enjoy her treats for a bit. Brutus & Barnaby sweet potato treats are a staple in this house.
customer_reviews.author: Chadentree Haney

customer_reviews.title: These were a hit in our home!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 German Shepherds and my little chihuahua absolutely loved these!! They all choose to eat them differently, my GSD girl inhaled it, my GSD boy can chew on it for up to an hour, and the small chihuahua savors it for like half day! There’s not 1 delivery from B&B that my dogs haven’t loved. This is my one and only go-to company for treats!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie cruz

customer_reviews.title: mine and my dogs favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands and they dont compare, these are thick orange and my dog loves them. Others are more peel then sweet potato flesh. Always a nice deep orange color. Never have been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chowes

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a Shitzu and he will be 14 years old in November. He goes through treats like no body's business. I like the fact that these are natural but he can devour just one in less then 3 minutes! I was hoping for something that would last longer and keep him occupied.
customer_reviews.author: mymadison

customer_reviews.title: Both Dogs Love These Sweet Tators
customer_reviews.text: I not sure my hand would be safe if I tried to take these back from my dogs. Hopper runs around the living room in joyful delight, then settles down to munching his treat. They both really like these.
customer_reviews.author: oldgamer

customer_reviews.title: Our Great Dane pup LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: We eat sweet potatoes a lot in our home and now Arthur gets to join us. The only "bad" thing is that we can't chow down on ours without making sure HE has one of his. They do leave an orange residue on his white paws, but it cleans off easily (usually with his tongue).
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Dogs have loved these for YEARS
customer_reviews.text: My 2 doggos LOVE these sweet potatoes, would keep an eye on them while eating them because for fast eaters these can be a choke / coughing issue (like anything else though. Been giving them to my fur puppers for a couple years and every single night they still get so excited for sweet potato time!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, and are the only thing that does not upset her stomach. They are large and small in the bag, smell amazing when you open the bag, fresh, and my dog cannot wait to get them everyday. She is a senior dog, and has lost quite a few teeth, but she is able to eat these, and it gives her enough to gnaw on to keep her teeth in pretty good shape. Do not hesitate to buy them, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ives

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and tender
customer_reviews.text: I believe in feeding my pets healthy and natural food as well as treats. Many years ago, we adopted a coon hound and have been giving him sweet potato treats for years and years. I recently received my first package from Brutus and Barnaby, and have never fed him anything that smelled as sweet and tasty as these treats! They are also more tender than others that we have bought from other sources. I will definitely be purchasing more for my 9 year old baby!
customer_reviews.author: NKGray

customer_reviews.title: Boxer Approved
customer_reviews.text: My Boxer really likes these. Usually I share my own sweet potatoes with him but these last longer due to being dehydrated so it’s a nice treat for him. They have a good smell! We will be purchasing more from this company! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MAJORTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Didn’t Like
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old Goldendoodle did not touch them and he eats everything!
customer_reviews.author: Russel Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Best Sweet Potato Chews Ever!
customer_reviews.text: All other sweet potato brands we have tried for our dog are hard. Dog saliva breaks them down, of course, but our boy gets sore spots in the corners of his mouth by the time he is done chewing. Not so with Brutus & Barnaby Sweet Potato Dog Treats. They arrive freshly dehydrated and smell great when you open the bag. Our dog and our visiting grandpup go bonkers for them! They are somewhat pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t give as a treat without supervision.
customer_reviews.text: Please monitor your pet when giving these as treats. My small dachshund tried to swallow a small piece and it got caught in her throat.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph M NYC

customer_reviews.title: treats
customer_reviews.text: Dogs did not like the taste, it may be a good product, cant say because I gave them away
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: A superior product! Sweet Potatoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been a devoted fan of Crumps for many years. Suddenly it takes a month to get a deilvery and our basset hound is addicted to sweet potatoes. With some reluctance I ordered Brutus & Barnaby and this is what I have uncovered. Brutus & Barnaby are so far superior that I am absolutely floored with the quality of the consistency and presentation. They smell great and are of a great size in length and thickness. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY A+
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They smell amazing and are typically bendable and thick. One bag will last my 6yr okd 29 lb Staffordshire Terrier about 3-4 weeks and they've never dried out in that amount if time here in Arizona, USA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: By far, the BEST part of my day is in the morning, when I give my three dogs their FAVORITE treat!! They love these and the are chewy so it’s takes a bit of time before they are begging for more.
customer_reviews.author: carry

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My pup enjoys these sweet potato chews. They are a chewy texture and that is what we were looking for. I always check for mold if a dehydrated treat still contains moisture and these were in great shape. Large bag states a product of USA and Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mc

customer_reviews.title: Too flat.
customer_reviews.text: My dog tryed to chew but it was hard for her to grab with mouth. It is very flat. She won't even try it a second time. I have a whole bag and she isn't interested. I wish it was more shaped to pick up with the mouth. I think the shape is against it.
customer_reviews.author: deborah Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie treats
customer_reviews.text: 1st my Dog ❤️ sweet potatoes, She ❤️these, I like them bcuz their natural sweet potatoes, no additives, proportions are perfect, nice product, will be ordering the B&B sweet potatoe fries next
customer_reviews.author: kimberle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I have a Black Lab who is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ! I have a Black Lab who is a very heavy chewer . These treats are absolutely perfect for him. The size and thickness are very good for him. I am already ordering a new bag to be on the "safe side'. Thank you !!!!!! Just wanted to say that this product is really great.The size and the texture is excellent for him.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: The dogs say they are pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love them. I thought they would be ven cuts but they are very rough cuts of sweet potato which makes it hard to maintain equality amongst the dogs. But they like them.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: My dog really likes them!
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retriever/ Great Pyrenees mix will eat anything from plastic to mulch but you give her a green bean and she won’t go near it! She won’t each vegetables period. But, she loves these freeze dried sweet potatoes! I admit the first time I gave it to her she was hesitant and not as excited as she would be over a meat jerky, but now she loves them, knows they are “her treats” and gets excited when she hears the bag! And I have confidence in knowing that I am giving her a healthy snack rather then empty calories!
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Dog not happy
customer_reviews.text: Honest review difficult as dog refused this. Never even took a bite! Want to provide healthy choice for 9 year old Goldendoodle. Passed on to other family member with pets.
customer_reviews.author: ma

customer_reviews.title: My two dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love these. Plus I know they are getting mostly vegetables. I have to watch that my 60 pound English shepherd doesn't get too much protein and the sweet potato slices are just right!
customer_reviews.author: ES owner

customer_reviews.title: Sweet potato winner
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and exactly as pictured-my cavalier loves them and I love that it's something he can have ( he has food allergies so treat shopping can be a challenge). I will definitely be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: gran

customer_reviews.title: My dog favorite snack!
customer_reviews.text: I order the treats once a monthly, I order the larger bag. There to seems to be more larger pieces than the smallest bag. My dog Charlie looks forward to his after dinner snack every night!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My Doha loves them. They are bigger than o thought better for larger dogs, but since my dog is only 10lbs I cut them in half. I like that they have no rawhide.
customer_reviews.author: Anne P Dours

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: I just got these sweet potato treats for my golden Doodle. He loves them! It doesn’t take long for him to chew one up but I like that these smell delicious and he has something other than a meat product for a treat. I will continue to buy these! Thanks Brutus and Barnaby for these tasty treats!
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: 100 % sweet potato.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but my dog loves this product. She is on a very restrictive diet and sweet potatoes are one of the few things she can eat.Other dog treats are pretty much off the “allowed list. “. Not only does she love the taste but she gets her chewing satisfaction for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: My Husky boy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the package my husky mix big baby started to beg for them, he loves it! the jerky smells great and looks like taste good too because he keeps begging for more!
customer_reviews.author: joanna

product_meta.title: BRUTUS & BARNABY Sweet Potato Dog Treats- Dehydrated North American All Natural Thick Cut Sweet Potato Slices, Grain Free, No Preservatives Added, Best High Anti-Oxidant Healthy Dog Chew
product_meta.description: Size:14 ozThese All Natural Dehydrated Sweet Potato Slices are the best healthy snack for your dog. Sourced in North America these thick cut treats are ideal for a dog that would benefit from a lower fat, low glycemic index, vitamin packed treat.
feature_bullets: 100% GUARANTEE as with all Brutus & Barnaby's products we back them with a money back guarantee no questions asked. These Sweet Potato's are perfect for the teething puppy or the senior dog on a diet

DEHYDRATED SWEET POTATO PRESERVES NATURAL ANTI-OXIDANTS, source of natures vitamins and minerals help complete your dogs nutrient needs without supplements- these are simply the best healthy snack or training reward.

THICK CUT and so can occupy your dogs time, no guilt giving your dog this treat often as there is zero fat, no added sugar, fiber provided by natural potato skins helps balance blood sugar levels so can be good for senior diabetic dogs. Can easily be cut or torn into smaller strips or chunks.
GLUTEN FREE, GRAIN FREE, easier to digest and can be great for dogs that may be allergic to other things. Excellent component to those who's dogs are on a raw food diet
